pages.text: $(li)The Magma Cream is an item that can be used to brew a Potion of Fire Resistance in a Brewing Stand.$(br)$(li)This item can be crafted placing a Blaze Powder and a Slimeball in a Crafting Table.

$(li)It can be used to craft a Magma Block, Magma Cream Block, or even a Redstone Inductor.$(br)$(li)It can be rarely found in Loot Chests in the Bastion Fortress too.$(br)$(li)The easiest way to obtain this item is slaying Magma Cubes, they may drop Magma Creams on death.
